author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Freddie Mac April 2018 Outlook
text:
April 23, 2018 / 1:15 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Freddie Mac April 2018 Outlook Reuters Staff 
April 23 (Reuters) - Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp : * FREDDIE MAC APRIL 2018 OUTLOOK 
* FREDDIE MAC - EXPECT MORTGAGE RATES TO FOLLOW THE 10-YEAR TREASURY HIGHER AND AVERAGE 4.9 PERCENT AND 5.4 PERCENT IN Q4 OF 2018 AND 2019, RESPECTIVELY 
* FREDDIE MAC - EXPECT TOTAL HOME SALES TO RISE FROM 6.12 MILLION IN 2017 TO 6.3 MILLION IN 2018, AND TO 6.44 MILLION IN 2019 WITH NEW HOME SALES DRIVING GROWTH 
* FREDDIE MAC - “BROADER ECONOMIC ENVIRONMENT REMAINS FAVORABLE FOR HOME SALES” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
